overview: Dr. David Baar, Ph.D., is the Founder and chief Technical Officer of lat49. He first founded IDELIX Software, Inc., originally the parent company of lat49, out of his research interests in software for numerical modeling and image processing. The company’s visionary, Dr. Baar has built a team of leading experts in information visualization to develop the company’s technology. Dr. Baar’s doctoral thesis is in the quantum magnetic properties of superconductors and his post-doctoral work included research in the numerical modeling of complex experiments and materials. He has also worked on image processing software for analyzing data from the Landsat satellites.
